data.title: Cathedral Of St. Mary Of The Assumption In San Francisco
data.meta_description: Welcome to the Cathedral of St. Mary of the Assumption, the mother church of the Archdiocese of San Francisco. The Cathedral is the site of beautiful
data.meta_site_name: Cathedral of St. Mary of the Assumption in San Francisco
data.text:
These free sessions on the third Friday of each month provide information on the grieving process and on tips on coping with the loss of a loved one. This is an opportunity to mourn in a safe, private and confidential setting. Refreshments will be provided. To reach Monsignor Bowe Room go to the Cleary Street (West) side of the Cathedral and enter through the iron gate and enter the door at the right. Refreshments will be provided. Contact the Facilitator at (415) 567-2020 Ext. 203 or email christophsandoval@gmail.com. Individual one-on-one Spiritual Care Support is also available by appointment.

7:30 a.m.

9:00 a.m.

11:00 a.m. Bilingual Mass and Spanish Mass merged (live-streamed)

Please join us in celebration of our Patroness with a crowning of Our Lady of the Assumption, Flower Offerings and Processions.

A free Festival of Food and Dance Performances will follow in Patronâ€™s Hall.

1:00 p.m. Mass cancelled
